casebody.data:
HEAD
v.
GOULD KILLIAN CPA GROUP, P.A., et al. 27A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 3, 2017 J. Daniel Bishop, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Head, Karen L. Brenda S. McClearn, Attorney at Law, Peter F. O'Connell, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Gould Killian CPA Group, P.A., et al. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Attorney at Law, Eva G. Frongello, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Certified Public Accountants.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of March 2017 by North Carolina Association of Certified Public Accountants for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of April 2017."
